EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Business Account (1564056705.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Business Account (1564056705.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Tina, Thank you for your recent kraft envelope purchases and sorry I was unable to talk get a hold of you over the phone. I would like the opportunity to assist with any other upcoming requirements with a Grand & Toy Business Account. Please let me know when you have a moment to discuss business account savings with Grand & Toy. Currently you have a consumer account, I have attached the account application (please complete green sections only) at no cost to your organization, savings of up to 80% compared to your consumer account, including a carton of letter size copy paper at $40.80 and up to 60% of Ink/Toner. If you have a large ticket item (items over $200), bulk order and furniture requirement, or if an item cannot be found online, please email me or call me directly for a updated quote. . Also please find attached a core list of business products with special savings.! I look forward to working with you, thank you.​
Kind Regards, Kyle
Kyle McGuire Business Development Manager, Canada 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6 E-mail: kylemcguire@grandandtoy.com |Tel: 613-244-4023 Toll Free: 800-348-2184 ext. 44023 Fax: 613-244-0765 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]>
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
